How to enable TOR:
▸open SET PROXY section,
▸add new proxy (socks5), server 127.0.0.1, port 9050,
▸enable TOR and wait for 100% bootstrapped. 
Done. 

In case of connection problems, enable bridges and get them from Dropbox.

When you set up an additional passcode for hidden chats each time you want get access to hidden chats property, will ask your password. also this is general in all your accounts. \n\nNote: if you forget the passcode, you can not open your hidden chats, you\'ll need to delete and reinstall the app. All secret chats will be lost.

A lot of temporary files accumulate in the cache, and this can cause problems when loading chats. It is advisable to delete them from the cache at least once a week (Clear Cache —> Other files button).

In Telegram, all chats and media you sent are stored on the Telegram cloud server and downloaded to the temporary folder on your device where you log in to Telegram (caching). This cache reduces the time to open files, but takes up space on your device.

Photos, videos and other files from cloud chats that you have **not accessed** during this period will be removed from this device to save disk space.
All media will stay in the Telegram cloud and will be re-downloaded when you play it.

There isn't possibility to save files to external storage on Android 4.4 and above, but the app can save files only in the following path in the external storage:

%s

Notice: files that are saved in this path will be removed by uninstalling BGram. So if you want to uninstall application without deleting files, before uninstalling the application use the file manager application on your phone and move the files that are stored in this path to another folder.

Will this path be used to save files?
